secciones.subtitulo:
We designed this product based on our personal experience and our expedition program (Ascent), a highly popular option with an itinerary carefully crafted to maximize summit success. This set of services is aimed at all types of expeditions, from individual mountaineers to expedition teams. Our logistical support allows you to maintain full control over your expedition while entrusting us with key aspects, enabling you to focus primarily on reaching the summit.

WE OFFER TWO OPTIONS: BASIC LOGISTICS PACKAGE AND FULL PACKAGE
secciones.html:
INCLUDED SERVICES

  • Transfer from Mendoza Airport IN - OUT (1)
  • Lodging in Mendoza, 3 * hotel, 2 nights, breakfast included (2)
  • Assistance to obtaining permits ascent
  • Transportation Mendoza - Penitentes - Mendoza (3)
  • Lodging in Penitentes, 2 nights, double occupancy at Mountain Refuge, breakfast and dinner included (4)
  • Transfer Penitentes - Horcones - Penitentes (5)
  • Mules services: Penitentes. - Plaza de Mulas - Penitentes (6))
  • 2 days full board at Confluencia BC (breakfast, lunch, dinner, bed)
  • 5 days full board in Plaza de Mulas BC (breakfast, lunch, dinner, bed or tent per 2 pax)
  • Dining at base camp
  • Exclusive bathrooms for our customers
  • Radial permanent communication between base camp, Mendoza and Penitentes.
  • Assistance to coordinate reservations, sending and receiving equipment.
  • Provision of weather forecast for all our expeditionary
  • Our camps have solar energy, radio BLU and VHF, satellite phone.
  • Reserved in advance and can prepare food for vegetarians or coeliacs


    • NOT INCLUDED SERVICES

  • Personal porters
  • Individual gear
  • Extra costs as a result of abandoning of the expedition
  • Medical or traveler's insurance. Costs as a result of an emergency rescue.
  • Personal expenses (drinks, laundry, mail, telephone calls)
  • All other services not listed as Included

  • Transportation in private vehicles: Mendoza - Penitentes Lodge

  • Transportation from Penitentes to Vacas Valley Park entrance
  • Transport of load by mules from Penitentes to Plaza Argentina and back
  • One dinner (BBQ) in camp Pampa de Leñas
  • Four days Full board service at Plaza Argentina BC
  • Our camps have solar energy, radios, Satellite Phone; meals are prepared following strict standards of hygiene. We also cater to vegetarians

secciones.subtitulo: Our mountain agency has permanent campsites during the climbing season on the most important bases of mountain, such as Confluencia, Plaza de Mulas, and Plaza Argentina. These base camps are equipped with meal services, gear storage, dining tents with seats and complete silverware, dishes and electric light, satellite phone, radio communication, bathrooms exclusively for our costume’s use, shower, porters or bearer services. We can caterer vegetarian food with the reservation in advance. Your expedition can choice services in our different and properties camp sites. Lanko compromise to freely take your waste down from the base camp to Penitentes. In this case, our staff in the base camps will sign your climbing permit in order to give proof that our company will be responsibe for your garbage.
